course_title: Advanced High Chinese for Heritage Speakers
course_description: This is a post-advanced course for Chinese heritage speakers. Through close reading and intensive writing on major social issues of contemporary China, it aims to further enhance students' Chinese language proficiency and deepen their understanding of the Chinese society beyond the advanced level.
sections: Class Nbr: 1596, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: H. Cheng, Status: Open
